articles.description: WANDERERS boss Ian Evatt has confirmed that Ricardo Santos, Dapo Afolayan and Kyle Dempsey will all miss Saturday’s clash with Sheffield Wednesday.
articles.content:
WANDERERS boss Ian Evatt has confirmed that Ricardo Santos, Dapo Afolayan and Kyle Dempsey will all miss Saturdays clash with Sheffield Wednesday.
The trio suffered hamstring injuries in the 1-1 dra… [+2561 chars]
